author: Justin Harp
title: Michael Shannon says that he'll play a ghost version of Zod in Batman v Superman - Movies
text: It looks like we finally have some answers on how General Zod will return for Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice.Michael Shannon was glimpsed briefly in the trailer for Zack Snyder's superhero epic, despite Zod being killed off in 2013's Man of Steel. © Warner Bros. During a recent chat with CinemaBlend, Shannon revealed that he will play a similar role in Batman v Superman as Russell Crowe's Jor-El served in Man of Steel."I say some stuff [in the movie], but not a whole lot! I mean, I am dead," Shannon joked. "I'm just like a ghost. It's kind of like Russell Crowe in the first one. Jor-El. "For some reason, these Kryptonian spirits, they linger. Even once you crack my neck, you can't shut me up." © Warner Bros. Take Shannon's admission with a grain of salt - considering that he recently admitted to lying about donning flipper hands for Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice.Meanwhile, Russell Crowe previously confirmed that his Jor-El will not been seen in Batman v Superman.Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice bows on March 25, 2016.
